articles.description: How Zhao Xintong's historic world snooker title win will be greeted in China - and what it could mean for the sport.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Winner Zhao Xintong will be 'national hero' in China

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold leaves Liverpool as a modern great - but there will be fans hurt by his decision, says BBC chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Right-back leaves Liverpool a modern great but some fans will be hurt

articles.description: Alpine are poised to replace Jack Doohan with Franco Colapinto after just six races of the season.
articles.title: Formula 1: Alpine poised to replace Jack Doohan with Franco Colapinto

articles.description: US president Donald Trump announces that the 2027 NFL Draft will take place in Washington DC.
articles.title: 2027 NFL Draft: US president Donald Trump confirms Washington DC will host event

articles.description: The British Superbike Championship event at Oulton Park is cancelled following a "severe and catastrophic incident" involving 11 riders.
articles.title: British Superbike Championship: Event cancelled after 'catastrophic incident'

articles.description: Jannik Sinner says it was "good news" for him personally not to miss any Grand Slam tournaments during his three-month doping ban.
articles.title: Italian Open: Jannik Sinner says not missing any Grand Slams during three-month doping ban was 'good news'

articles.description: Zhao Xintong makes history as he becomes the first player from China to win the World Championship with an 18-12 victory over Mark Williams in Sheffield.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025: Zhao Xintong claims historic victory over Mark Williams in Crucible final

articles.description: Nottingham Forest boss Nuno Espirito Santo said the race to secure a Champions League place will go "all the way" this season.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest drop points in Champions League race - but who will prevail?

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler and Bryson DeChambeau's weekend victories prove Rory McIlroy is not the only player in form as the year's second major races into view, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler and Bryson DeChambeau wins raise US PGA Championship excitement levels

articles.description: Gérald Darmanin admitted it was a "mistake" to point the finger at Liverpool fans for the security breakdown at the 2022 final.
articles.title: French minister apologises to Liverpool fans over Champions League chaos
